title: Xperia 1 IV renders reveal practically identical design to predecessor for upcoming flagship
content:
The first 3D renders of the Sony Xperia 1 IV have been shared and showcase a practically identical design and look to last year’s impressive Xperia 1 III.

more…

The post Xperia 1 IV renders reveal practically identical design to predecessor for upcoming flagship appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The first 3D renders of the Sony Xperia 1 IV showcase a practically identical design and look to last year's impressive Xperia 1 III.
